settings.title: Publisher Settings
settings.description: Manage your publisher profile and account settings.

profile.title: Publisher Profile
profile.description: This information will be displayed publicly on your extensions.
profile.displayNameDescription: The name shown to users on your extensions.
profile.slugDescription: A unique identifier for your publisher profile. Used in URLs.
profile.slugTaken: This publisher ID is already taken.
profile.emailDescription: Public contact email for users to reach you.
profile.bioDescription: A short description about you or your organization.
profile.error: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

createProfile.title: Create Publisher Profile
createProfile.description: Set up your publisher profile to start publishing extensions.

account.title: Account
account.deleteWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Use API keys to authenticate CLI tools and CI/CD pipelines.
apiKeys.createDescription: API keys allow you to upload extensions from the command line or CI/CD pipelines.
apiKeys.name: Key Name
apiKeys.keyWarning: Make sure to copy this key now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiKeys.emptyHint: Create an API key to upload extensions from the command line.
